title: Giant Gorg
synopsis: Austral Island is located 2,000 km south from Samoa islands. The existence of the island was removed from the official records, and Tagami Yuu made a journey to search for the reason.
voices: ['Amemiya, Kazumi', 'Imanishi, Masao', 'Yamada, Keaton', 'Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Senda, Mitsuo', 'Takashima, Gara', 'Ikeda, Shuuichi', 'Satou, Masaharu', 'Totani, Kouji']
